label: uncl4065
comment: Code to identify the conditions of contract and carriage.

values.label: AVC conditions
values.comment: General conditions of transport 1983, latest revision laid down by the Stichting Vervoeradres The Hague.

values.label: Special agreement for parcels transport
values.comment: Appliance of a non published special agreement signed between a customer and the carrier (mandatory requested by the consignor) for parcels transport.

values.label: Special agreement for full loading transport
values.comment: Appliance of a non published special agreement signed between a customer and the carrier (mandatory requested by the consignor) for full load transport.

values.label: Combined transport
values.comment: A transport which involves more than one mode of transportation.

values.label: FIATA combined transport bill of lading
values.comment: Standard conditions of a combined transport bill of lading issued by FIATA.

values.label: Freight forwarders national conditions
values.comment: The contract and carriage conditions as established by freight forwarders on a national basis.

values.label: Normal tariff, parcels transport
values.comment: Appliance of the published legal tariff in case of parcels transport (required or not by the consignor.

values.label: Normal tariff, full loading transport
values.comment: Appliance of the published legal tariff in case of full load transport (required or not by the consignor).

values.label: Ordinary
values.comment: Carrier will choose the cheapest tariff in the legally published tariffs for parcels or full load transports (no tariff required by the consignor).

values.label: Port to port
values.comment: The transport will only be port to port, no inland transport would have to be provided under the contract.

values.label: CMR carnet
values.comment: Conditions in accordance with the convention of the contract for the international carriage of goods by road.

values.label: Special tariff, parcels transport
values.comment: Appliance of the legally published "special" tariff in case or parcels transport (tariff requested by the consignor).

values.label: Special tariff, full transport
values.comment: Appliance of the legally published "special tariff" in case of full load transport (tariff requested by the consignor).

values.label: Through transport
values.comment: The transport that is contracted not only from port to port, but from one inland location to another inland location.

values.label: Cancel space allocation
values.comment: Indication that space previously allocated on a flight is to be cancelled.

values.label: Report sale of space
values.comment: Indication that a sale has been made against a space allocation on a specific flight.

values.label: Alternative space allocation
values.comment: Indication that space is being requested for a specific flight and that an alternative is acceptable.

values.label: No alternative space allocation
values.comment: Indication that space is being requested for a specific flight and that an alternative is not acceptable.

values.label: Allotment sale
values.comment: Indication that space is being sold against a space allocation allotment on a specific flight.

values.label: Confirmation of space
values.comment: Indication that space requested has been confirmed on a specific flight.

values.label: Unable to confirm
values.comment: Indication that airline is unable to confirm the space allocation on a specific flight.

values.label: Non-operative flight
values.comment: Indication that airline is unable to confirm space on a specific flight since the flight does not operate.

values.label: Wait list
values.comment: Indication that the space allocation request has been assigned to a wait list.

values.label: Prior space allocation request
values.comment: Indication that a space allocation on a specific flight has already been requested.

values.label: Holding confirmed space allocation
values.comment: Indication that space is being held as confirmed on a specific flight.

values.label: Holding wait list
values.comment: Indication that space allocation request on a specific flight has been assigned to a wait list.

values.label: Door-to-door
values.comment: The carrier is responsible for the intermodal carriage of cargo including both the pre-carriage and the on- carriage.

values.label: Door-to-pier
values.comment: The carrier is responsible for the intermodal carriage of cargo including the pre-carriage, but excluding the on-carriage.

values.label: Pier-to-door
values.comment: The carrier is responsible for the intermodal carriage of cargo including the on-carriage, but excluding the pre-carriage.

values.label: Pier-to-pier
values.comment: The carrier of intermodal cargo is only responsible for the main carriage.

values.label: Space cancellation noted
values.comment: Indication that space previously allocated on a means of transport has been cancelled.

values.label: Mini landbridge service
values.comment: Cargo moving from a coastal port for delivery at an inland location or cargo received at an inland location moving to a coastal port for subsequent ocean transportation.

values.label: Speed level - required
values.comment: Maximum speed required on an itinerary or part of this itinerary to be able to assume some services.

values.label: Speed level - adopted
values.comment: Real speed used on an itinerary or part of this itinerary (for technical reasons, some limitation can be imposed or some higher speed could be used).

values.label: Normal tariff, less than full load transport
values.comment: Application of the published legal tariff in case of less than full load transport (required or not by the consignor).

values.label: Re-expedition special tariff
values.comment: Indication that a special tariff must be used in the case of a re-expedition.

values.label: Transport arrangement by the requester
values.comment: The service requester has the responsibility of making transport arrangement.

values.label: Transport arrangement by the provider
values.comment: The service provider has the responsibility of making transport arrangement.

values.label: Transport arrangement by the patient
values.comment: The patient has the responsibility of making transport arrangement.
